Purkškite tolygiai ant sausų plaukų 20–30 cm atstumu. Venkite šaknų, kad išlaikytumėte lengvą, ilgai išliekantį kvapą ir spindesį. Naudokite pagal poreikį, kad atgaivintumėte ir suteiktumėte šukuosenai tvarkingą išvaizdą.

Šis plaukų kvepalų purškiklis suteikia plaukams natūralaus žvilgesio, palikdamas juos minkštus, glotnius ir apsaugotus nuo šiaušimosi. Ilgai išliekantis kvapas užtikrina gaivų ir malonų plaukų aromatą visą dieną. Dėl apsaugos nuo drėgmės plaukai išliks nepriekaištingi bet kokiomis oro sąlygomis.

Visų tipų plaukams.

products.name: MY.ORGANICS Revival Leave-In Mist Goji
products.short_description: A hydrating anti-frizz spray with organic goji berry extract that protects hair from environmental damage while smoothing and adding shine.

Spray 2–3 times onto damp hair and gently massage through the lengths. Dry and style as desired. Can also be used on dry hair in the morning for nourishment and frizz control before styling.

This lightweight anti-frizz spray hydrates and protects hair from heat, pollution, and UV rays. Enriched with organic goji berry extract, it restores shine, softness, and elasticity without weighing hair down. products.short_description: A silky, lightweight leave-in hair cream infused with goji berry extract to hydrate, detangle, and protect without weighing hair down.

Apply a small amount to damp or dry hair, focusing on the ends. Comb through to distribute evenly and style as desired. Use throughout the day for touch-ups and added hydration.

All hair types, ideal for daily use.

Rub a few drops between your palms and distribute evenly through wet or dry hair, focusing on mid-lengths and ends. Do not rinse.

This restructuring oil reduces frizz, enhances shine, and nourishes hair without weighing it down. Suitable for frequent use on all hair types, it protects dry and damaged hair, leaving it smooth, silky, and vibrant. Sunflower Seed Oil: Provides deep hydration and protection.

All hair types, especially dry and damaged hair.

Keliais lašais patrinkite tarp delnų ir tolygiai paskirstykite ant drėgnų ar sausų plaukų, sutelkiant dėmesį į vidurinę plaukų dalį ir galiukus. Nenuskalauti.

Šis atkuriamasis aliejus mažina šiaušimąsi, suteikia blizgesio ir maitina plaukus jų neapsunkindamas. Tinka dažnam naudojimui visų tipų plaukams. Apsaugo sausus ir pažeistus plaukus, palikdamas juos glotnius, šilkinius ir gyvybingus. Dimetikonas ir Dimetikonolis: Glotnina ir apsaugo plaukus, mažina šiaušimąsi ir suteikia blizgesio. Visų tipų plaukams, ypač sausiems ir pažeistiems.

products.name: MY.ORGANICS Miracle Mask Goji
products.short_description: A hydrating and restructuring mask enriched with GOJI, designed to deeply penetrate the hair shaft and provide intense nourishment.

Application:

Apply a generous amount to clean, damp hair, focusing on mid-lengths and ends. Leave on for 5-10 minutes to allow the mask to deeply penetrate and nourish. Rinse thoroughly with warm water. Use once a week or as needed.

Features and Benefits:

The Miracle Mask Goji provides intense hydration and nourishment, restructuring dry, brittle, and damaged hair. Its lightweight formula enhances softness, shine, and silkiness without compromising volume or texture. Perfect for all hair types, including colour-treated and bleached hair, it helps repair damage from heat styling, chemical treatments, and environmental factors. Regular use restores hair health and leaves it vibrant, smooth, and manageable.

Suitable for:

All hair types, especially dry, brittle, and chemically treated hair.
products.ingredients: Cyclopentasiloxane, Aqua [Water], Propylene glycol, Dimethiconol, Myristyl alcohol, Cetrimonium chloride, Lycium barbarum fruit extract, Glycerin, Citric acid, Potassium sorbate, Sodium benzoate, Sodium dehydroacetate, Parfum [Fragrance], Linalool, Eugenol.

Užtepkite gausų kiekį ant švarių, drėgnų plaukų, sutelkiant dėmesį į vidurinę plaukų dalį ir galiukus. Palaikykite 5–10 minučių, kad kaukė giliai įsigertų ir pamaitintų plaukus. Kruopščiai išskalaukite šiltu vandeniu. Naudokite kartą per savaitę arba pagal poreikį.

„Miracle Mask Goji“ intensyviai drėkina ir maitina, atkuria sausus, lūžinėjančius ir pažeistus plaukus. Puikiai tinka visų tipų plaukams, įskaitant dažytus ir balintus, padeda atkurti žalą, atsiradusią dėl karščio formavimo, cheminių procedūrų ir aplinkos poveikio. Reguliarus naudojimas atkuria plaukų sveikatą, palikdamas juos gyvybingus, glotnius ir lengvai valdomus.

Visų tipų plaukams, ypač sausiems, lūžinėjantiems ir chemiškai apdorotiems.

Apply a small amount to wet hair and gently massage into the scalp and hair. Leave for 1-2 minutes, then rinse thoroughly with warm water. For best results, follow with a conditioner.

The Supreme Shampoo with GOJI penetrates deeply to repair and strengthen damaged hair, improving its structure and resilience. Its pH-balanced formula (5.0 - 5.5) restores moisture and enhances shine, making it ideal for coloured or natural hair. With regular use, it detangles, improves manageability, and leaves hair smooth, vibrant, and easy to style.

Naudojimas:

Dosniai užtepkite MY.ORGANICS Apimties Suteikiančią Kaukę ant švarių, drėgnų plaukų, ypatingą dėmesį skirdami vidurinei plaukų daliai ir galiukams. Kaukė padeda iššukuoti, apsaugo ir atgaivina sausus bei pažeistus plaukus, suteikdama jiems lengvumo ir švelnumo.

products.name: MY.ORGANICS Color Protect Conditioner Oat and Eucalyptus
products.short_description: A nourishing, pH-balanced conditioner enriched with oat and eucalyptus to hydrate, protect colour, and enhance shine while soothing the scalp.
products.description:
Application:

Apply a small amount of MY.ORGANICS Color Protect Conditioner to clean, damp hair, focusing on the ends. Leave on for a few minutes to allow the nourishing ingredients to penetrate, then rinse thoroughly with warm water.

Features and Benefits:

The Colour Protect Conditioner rebalances the hair and scalp after chemical treatments, restoring natural softness, brightness, and volume. The pH-balanced formula seals the hair cuticles, locking in colour and preventing fading. Enriched with oat and eucalyptus extracts, it provides deep hydration, soothes irritation, and refreshes the scalp. Free from parabens, formaldehyde, and SLS, it offers a gentle yet effective daily care solution.

Suitable for:

All hair types, especially colour-treated and chemically processed hair. Ideal for maintaining colour vibrancy and ensuring healthy, shiny locks.

Colour Protect kondicionierius atkuria plaukų ir galvos odos pusiausvyrą po cheminio apdorojimo, suteikdamas natūralaus minkštumo, blizgesio ir apimties. Subalansuotas pH padeda užverti plauko kutikulę, sulaikyti spalvą ir užkirsti kelią jos blukimui. Sudėtyje esantys avižų ir eukalipto ekstraktai drėkina, ramina ir atgaivina galvos odą. products.name: MY.ORGANICS Deep Restructuring Conditioner Argan
products.short_description: A professional deep-conditioning treatment enriched with argan oil and silk extracts to restore, hydrate, and nourish very dry, brittle, and chemically treated hair.
products.description:
Application:

Apply the MY.ORGANICS Deep Restructuring Conditioner generously to clean, damp hair, focusing on mid-lengths and ends. Leave on for 5-10 minutes to allow deep penetration of nutrients. Rinse thoroughly with warm water. Use regularly for best results.

Features and Benefits:

This restructuring deep conditioner provides intensive hydration and nourishment for very dry, split, and chemically treated hair. Enriched with argan oil and silk extracts, it locks in moisture, reduces breakage, and enhances shine and volume. The formula helps restore hair's natural balance with a pH level of 3.5 - 4.0, leaving it supple, manageable, and revitalized. Plant-based ingredients, such as avocado and sweet almond extracts, work together to deeply nourish and hydrate, ensuring a smooth, frizz-free finish.

Suitable for:

Dry, frizzy, curly, and chemically treated hair in need of deep hydration and repair.

products.name: MY.ORGANICS Thickening Conditioner Mango and Rose
products.short_description: A luxurious, pH-balanced conditioner enriched with mango and rose extracts, designed to nourish, thicken, and protect dry, chemically treated, or colored hair, leaving it soft, smooth, and full of life.
products.description:
Application:

Apply the MY.ORGANICS Thickening Conditioner to clean, damp hair, focusing on mid-lengths and ends. Leave on for 2-3 minutes, then rinse thoroughly with warm water. Use regularly for best results.

Features and Benefits:

Enriched with mango and rose extracts, it hydrates and revitalizes, creating a protective barrier against heat, UV rays, and pollution. With a pH-balanced formula, it maintains the health of chemically treated or colored hair, leaving it soft, smooth, and manageable.  Mango extract strengthens and thickens hair strands with its high vitamin content, promoting fuller, healthier-looking hair. Rose extract adds luxury with antioxidant properties that protect against environmental damage.

Suitable for:

All hair types, especially dry, chemically treated, or colored hair that requires intensive care and protection.

Apply the MY.ORGANICS Purify Conditioner to clean, damp hair, focusing on mid-lengths and ends. Leave on for 2-3 minutes, then rinse thoroughly with warm water. Use regularly for best results.

This purifying conditioner effectively removes impurities, rebalances the scalp, and promotes natural hair regrowth. Specially formulated for thin and brittle hair, it enhances body, volume, and shine while improving silkiness. With regular use, it strengthens hair, reduces breakage, and leaves it healthier, more resilient, and easier to manage. Lavender and Eucalyptus Essential Oils – Soothe and nourish the scalp while enhancing shine and silkiness.

Apply the MY.ORGANICS Hydrating Conditioner to clean, damp hair, focusing on mid-lengths and ends. Leave on for 2-3 minutes, then rinse thoroughly with warm water. Use daily or as needed for best results.

This hydrating conditioner is specially formulated to repair and regenerate dry and stressed hair, restoring moisture and vitality. Enriched with yoghurt for deep hydration and lavender for soothing scalp care, it reduces frizz, improves texture, and leaves hair soft, shiny, and manageable. Yoghurt: Deeply nourishes and hydrates the hair while restoring softness and shine. It contains lactic acid to gently exfoliate the scalp, promoting healthy hair growth. Lavender: Soothes and calms the scalp, reduces irritation, and imparts a fresh, clean scent. Pair with the Hydrating Shampoo for enhanced results.

Suitable for:

Dry, stressed, and chemically treated hair in need of hydration, nourishment, and repair.

products.name: MY.ORGANICS No-Yellow Shampoo Walnut and Sweet Almond
products.short_description: A gentle, pH-balanced shampoo enriched with walnut and sweet almond extracts to neutralize yellow tones, nourish, and enhance the shine of grey, white, and bleached hair.
products.description:
Application:

Wet hair thoroughly and apply the shampoo evenly to hair and scalp. Massage gently and leave on for 5-10 minutes to neutralize yellow tones. Rinse thoroughly with warm water. For best results, follow with a conditioner.

Features and Benefits:

Formulated specifically for grey, white, and bleached hair, this no-yellow shampoo neutralizes unwanted yellow tones, enhances brightness, and revives highlights. Walnut extract enhances hair color, adds shine, and soothes the scalp with its anti-inflammatory properties. Sweet almond extract deeply nourishes, improves elasticity, and strengthens hair, leaving it soft, smooth, and lustrous. Together, these extracts neutralize yellow tones while promoting healthier, more manageable hair.

Suitable for:

Ideal for grey, white, and bleached hair looking to enhance brightness and neutralize brassiness.
products.lt_short_description: Švelnus, pH subalansuotas šampūnas su graikinių riešutų ir saldžiųjų migdolų ekstraktais, skirtas neutralizuoti geltonus atspalvius, maitinti ir suteikti blizgesio žiliems, baltiems ir šviesintiems plaukams.
products.lt_description:
Naudojimas:

Gerai sudrėkinkite plaukus ir tolygiai paskirstykite šampūną ant plaukų ir galvos odos. Švelniai įmasažuokite ir palikite 5–10 minučių, kad neutralizuotų geltonus atspalvius. Kruopščiai išskalaukite šiltu vandeniu. Geriausiam rezultatui pasiekti naudokite kartu su kondicionieriumi.

Savybės ir privalumai:

Šis specialiai žiliems, baltiems ir šviesintiems plaukams sukurtas šampūnas neutralizuoja nepageidaujamus geltonus atspalvius, suteikia plaukams spindesio ir atgaivina sruogas. Graikinių riešutų ekstraktas pabrėžia plaukų spalvą, suteikia blizgesio ir ramina galvos odą dėl savo priešuždegiminių savybių. Saldžiųjų migdolų ekstraktas giliai maitina, gerina elastingumą ir stiprina plaukus, palikdamas juos minkštus, glotnius ir žvilgančius. Šie ekstraktai kartu padeda neutralizuoti geltonus atspalvius ir skatina sveikesnius, lengviau suvaldomus plaukus.

Tinka:

Idealiai tinka žiliems, baltiems ir šviesintiems plaukams, siekiant suteikti jiems spindesio ir neutralizuoti gelsvumą.

products.name: MY.ORGANICS Color Protect Shampoo Aloe and Calendula
products.short_description: A pH-balanced shampoo designed to protect and prolong the vibrancy of coloured or treated hair. Enriched with aloe and calendula, it hydrates, nourishes, and strengthens, leaving hair softer, shinier, and easier to manage.
products.description:
Application:

Apply a small amount of shampoo to damp hair. Massage gently into the scalp and hair. Leave for 2 minutes, then rinse thoroughly with warm water. Towel dry and style as desired.

Features and Benefits:

Formulated to maintain and enhance the vibrancy of coloured hair, this pH-balanced shampoo protects against premature fading while strengthening and hydrating. Aloe vera hydrates and nourishes, strengthening hair while maintaining softness and manageability. Calendula helps to lock in vibrant colour, prolonging its intensity and adding shine. Together, these ingredients ensure a protective and rejuvenating experience for coloured or treated hair.

Suitable for:

Ideal for coloured or chemically treated hair, ensuring prolonged colour vibrancy and overall hair health.
products.ingredients: Aqua [Water] (Eau), Sodium coceth sulfate, Cocamidopropyl betaine, Sodium chloride, Foeniculum vulgare (Fennel) oil, Lavandula angustifolia (Lavender) oil, Citrus medica vulgaris peel oil, Aloe barbadensis leaf extract (*), Calendula officinalis flower extract (*), Achillea millefolium flower/leaf/stem extract (*), Hydrolyzed soy protein, Sodium sunflowerseedamphoacetate, Benzyl alcohol, Polyquaternium-10, Glycerin, Decyl glucoside, Coco-glucoside, Glyceryl oleate, Linalool.
products.lt_name: MY.ORGANICS Šampūnas Dažytiems Plaukams su Alaviju ir Madetkomis
products.lt_short_description: pH subalansuotas šampūnas, skirtas apsaugoti ir prailginti dažytų ar chemiškai apdorotų plaukų ryškumą. Praturtintas alaviju ir medetkomis, šis šampūnas drėkina, maitina ir stiprina plaukus, suteikdamas jiems švelnumo, žvilgesio ir lengvesnį valdymą.
products.lt_description:
Naudojimas:

Užtepti nedidelį kiekį šampūno ant drėgnų plaukų. Švelniai įmasežuoti į galvos odą ir plaukus. Palikti 2 minutėms, tada kruopščiai išskalauti šiltu vandeniu. Nusausinti rankšluosčiu ir formuoti kaip įprasta.

Savybės ir privalumai:

Šis pH subalansuotas šampūnas skirtas išlaikyti ir sustiprinti dažytų plaukų ryškumą, apsaugant juos nuo priešlaikinio blukimo bei stiprinant ir drėkinant. Alavijas drėkina ir maitina plaukus, stiprina juos ir palaiko jų švelnumą bei lengvą valdymą. Medetkos padeda išlaikyti intensyvią spalvą, suteikia plaukams žvilgesio ir apsaugą. Šių ingredientų derinys užtikrina apsaugą ir atgaivinimą dažytiems ar chemiškai apdorotiems plaukams.

Tinka:

Idealiai tinka dažytiems ar chemiškai apdorotiems plaukams, siekiant išsaugoti spalvos intensyvumą ir užitikrinti ilgalaikę plaukų sveikatą.
products.lt_ingredients: Aqua [Water] (Eau), Sodium coceth sulfate, Cocamidopropyl betaine, Sodium chloride, Foeniculum vulgare (Fennel) oil, Lavandula angustifolia (Lavender) oil, Citrus medica vulgaris peel oil, Aloe barbadensis leaf extract (*), Calendula officinalis flower extract (*), Achillea millefolium flower/leaf/stem extract (*), Hydrolyzed soy protein, Sodium sunflowerseedamphoacetate, Benzyl alcohol, Polyquaternium-10, Glycerin, Decyl glucoside, Coco-glucoside, Glyceryl oleate, Linalool.

products.name: MY.ORGANICS Restructuring Shampoo Argan
products.short_description: A nourishing and revitalizing shampoo for dry, damaged, and treated hair. Infused with chamomile, wheat protein, silk extracts, and essential oils, it deeply moisturizes, strengthens, and restores shine, leaving hair soft, smooth, and healthy.
products.description:
Application:

Apply a small amount of shampoo to damp hair. Massage gently into the scalp and hair. Leave for 2 minutes, then rinse thoroughly with warm water. Towel dry and style as desired.

Features and Benefits:

This restructuring shampoo is formulated to deeply nourish and revitalize dry, damaged, and treated hair. Chamomile moisturizes, soothes, and hydrates dry hair, leaving it soft and manageable. Wheat protein repairs and strengthens damaged hair, restoring its natural shine and vitality. Silk extracts add softness and shine, while essential oils provide nourishment and a luxurious aromatic experience. Vitamins regenerate and protect stressed hair, improving resilience and health.

Suitable for daily use.
products.ingredients: Aqua [Water] (Eau), Sodium coceth sulfate, Cocamidopropyl betaine, Sodium chloride, Argania spinosa kernel oil (*), Sodium arganamphoacetate, Foeniculum vulgare (Fennel) oil, Lavandula angustifolia (Lavender) oil, Citrus aurantium dulcis (Orange) peel oil, Pelargonium graveolens oil, Salvia officinalis (Sage) oil, Chamomilla recutita (Matricaria) flower extract (*), Panicum miliaceum (Millet) seed extract (*), Amyris balsamifera bark oil, Persea gratissima (Avocado) oil (*), Hydrolyzed soy protein, Hydroxypropyltrimonium hydrolyzed wheat protein , Cocodimonium hydroxypropyl silk amino acids, Hydrolyzed silk, Sodium cocoyl sarcosinate, Benzyl alcohol, Decyl glucoside, Coco-glucoside, Glyceryl oleate, Polyquaternium-10, Sodium benzoate, Sodium dehydroacetate, Limonene, Glycerin, Linalool, Lactic acid, Citronellol, Geraniol, Caramel, Sodium cocoyl glutamate.
products.lt_name: MY.ORGANICS Atstatomasis Šampūnas su Arganu ir Šilkais
products.lt_short_description: Maitinamasis ir atkuriamasis šampūnas sausiems, pažeistiems ir chemiškai apdorotiems plaukams. Praturtintas ramunėlėmis, kviečių baltymais, šilko ekstraktais ir eteriniais aliejais, jis giliai drėkina, stiprina ir atkuria plaukų blizgesį, palikdamas juos švelnius, glotnius ir sveikus.
products.lt_description:
Naudojimas:

Nedidelį kiekį šampūno paskirstykite ant drėgnų plaukų. Švelniai įmasažuokite į galvos odą ir plaukus. Palikite 2 minutėms, tada kruopščiai nuskalaukite šiltu vandeniu. Nusausinkite rankšluosčiu ir formuokite kaip įprasta.

Savybės ir privalumai:

Šis atkuriamasis šampūnas sukurtas siekiant giliai maitinti ir atgaivinti sausus, pažeistus ir chemiškai apdorotus plaukus. Ramunėlės drėkina, ramina ir maitina plaukus, suteikdamos jiems švelnumo ir lengvumo. Kviečių baltymai atkuria ir stiprina pažeistus plaukus, grąžindami jiems natūralų blizgesį ir gyvybingumą. Šilko ekstraktai suteikia minkštumo ir žvilgesio, o eteriniai aliejai maitina ir dovanoja prabangų aromatinį potyrį. Vitaminai atkuria ir apsaugo įsitempusius plaukus, pagerindami jų atsparumą ir sveikatą.

Tinka naudoti kasdien.

products.name: MY.ORGANICS Thickening Shampoo Orange and Lemon
products.short_description: A revitalizing and thickening shampoo enriched with citrus and peppermint oils, designed to cleanse, hydrate, and promote healthy hair growth.
products.description:
Application:

Apply a small amount of shampoo to damp hair. Gently massage into the scalp and work through the hair. Leave on for 2 minutes, then rinse thoroughly with warm water. Towel dry and style as desired.

Features and Benefits:

This thickening shampoo deeply cleanses and revitalizes the scalp while promoting hair growth and regulating oil production. Regular use helps restore lightness and vitality to thin, greasy hair. Citrus oils (lemon and orange) cleanse and stimulate the scalp, removing excess oil and buildup while retaining moisture to prevent dryness and breakage. Peppermint oil promotes hair growth by increasing blood circulation, soothes irritation, regulates oil production, and adds a refreshing, cooling sensation.

Suitable for:

Daily use on thin and oily hair in need of volume and freshness.
products.ingredients: Aqua [Water] (Eau), Sodium coceth sulfate, Cocamidopropyl betaine, Sodium chloride, Citrus limon (Lemon) peel oil, Citrus aurantium dulcis (Orange) peel oil, Citrus nobilis (Mandarin orange) peel oil, Trigonella foenum graecum seed extract (*), Mentha piperita (Peppermint) oil, Benzyl alcohol, Lactic acid, Sodium benzoate, Sodium dehydroacetate, Sodium sunflowerseedamphoacetate, Limonene, Polyquaternium-10 , Decyl glucoside, Coco­ glucoside, Glyceryl oleate, Glycerin, Citral.
products.lt_name: MY.ORGANICS Apimtį Suteikiantis Šampūnas su Apelsinais ir Citrina
products.lt_short_description: Atgaivinantis ir tankinantis šampūnas su citrusinių vaisių ir pipirmėčių aliejais, skirtas valymui, drėkinimui ir sveikam plaukų augimui skatinti.
products.lt_description:
Naudojimas:

Nedidelį kiekį šampūno paskirstykite ant drėgnų plaukų. Švelniai įmasažuokite į galvos odą ir perbraukite per plaukus. Palaikykite 2 minutes, tada kruopščiai nuplaukite šiltu vandeniu. Nusausinkite rankšluosčiu ir modeliuokite kaip įprasta.

Savybės ir privalumai:

Šis tankinantis šampūnas giliai valo ir atgaivina galvos odą, skatina plaukų augimą bei reguliuoja riebalų išsiskyrimą. Reguliarus naudojimas padeda atkurti lengvumą ir gaivumą ploniems, linkusiems riebaluotis plaukams. Citrusinių vaisių aliejai (citrina ir apelsinas): valo ir stimuliuoja galvos odą, pašalina riebalų perteklių ir nešvarumus, išlaiko drėgmę bei apsaugo nuo sausėjimo ir lūžinėjimo. Pipirmėčių aliejus: skatina plaukų augimą, gerina kraujotaką, ramina sudirgusią odą, reguliuoja riebalų išsiskyrimą ir suteikia gaivų vėsinantį pojūtį.

Tinka:

Kasdieniniam naudojimui ploniems, riebiems plaukams, kuriems reikia apimties ir gaivumo.
products.lt_ingredients: Aqua [Water] (Eau), Sodium coceth sulfate, Cocamidopropyl betaine, Sodium chloride, Citrus limon (Lemon) peel oil, Citrus aurantium dulcis (Orange) peel oil, Citrus nobilis (Mandarin orange) peel oil, Trigonella foenum graecum seed extract (*), Mentha piperita (Peppermint) oil, Benzyl alcohol, Lactic acid, Sodium benzoate, Sodium dehydroacetate, Sodium sunflowerseedamphoacetate, Limonene, Polyquaternium-10 , Decyl glucoside, Coco­ glucoside, Glyceryl oleate, Glycerin, Citral.

products.name: MY.ORGANICS Purify Shampoo Rosemary
products.short_description: A purifying shampoo infused with rosemary, lavender, and eucalyptus essential oils. It combats hair loss, soothes the scalp, and promotes healthy hair growth while leaving hair soft and revitalized.
products.description:
Application:

Apply a small amount of shampoo to damp hair. Massage gently into the scalp and distribute evenly through the hair. Leave on for 2 minutes, then rinse thoroughly with warm water. Towel dry and style as desired.

Features and Benefits:

This purifying shampoo is formulated to combat hair loss with a rebalancing action that deeply cleanses and soothes the scalp. Its pH-balanced formula promotes healthy hair growth, strengthens strands, and provides moisture, leaving hair soft, shiny, and revitalized.

Rosemary: stimulates blood circulation to nourish hair follicles. Lavender: soothes sensitive scalps, reducing irritation. Eucalyptus: strengthens hair while providing a refreshing sensation.

Suitable for:

Daily use on all hair types, especially for those experiencing hair loss or scalp sensitivity.
products.ingredients: Aqua [Water], Sodium coceth sulfate, Cocamidopropyl betaine, Sodium chloride, *Rosmarinus officinalis (Rosemary) leaf oil, *Eucalyptus globulus leaf oil, *Melissa officinalis leaf extract, *Urtica dioica (Nettle) extract, *Lavandula angustifolia (Lavender) oil, Benzyl alcohol, Lactic acid, Sodium benzoate, Sodium dehydroacetate, Sodium sunflowerseedamphoacetate, Polyquaternium-10, Lauryl glucoside, Glycerin, Coco-glucoside, Glyceryl oleate, Limonene.
products.lt_short_description: Valomasis šampūnas su rozmarinų, levandų ir eukaliptų eteriniais aliejais. Kovoja su plaukų slinkimu, ramina galvos odą ir skatina sveiką plaukų augimą, palikdamas juos minkštus ir atgaivintus.
products.lt_description:
Naudojimas:

Nedidelį kiekį šampūno paskirstykite ant drėgnų plaukų. Švelniai įmasažuokite į galvos odą ir tolygiai paskirstykite per visą plaukų ilgį. Palaikykite 2 minutes, tada kruopščiai nuplaukite šiltu vandeniu. Nusausinkite rankšluosčiu ir modeliuokite kaip įprasta.

Savybės ir privalumai:

Šis valomasis šampūnas sukurtas kovai su plaukų slinkimu, turintis balansavimo efektą, kuris giliai valo ir ramina galvos odą. Subalansuota pH formulė skatina sveiką plaukų augimą, stiprina sruogas ir suteikia drėgmės, palikdamas plaukus minkštus, žvilgančius ir atgaivintus. Rozmarinas: stimuliuoja kraujotaką, maitina plaukų folikulus. Levanda: ramina jautrią galvos odą ir mažina sudirgimą. Eukaliptas: stiprina plaukus ir suteikia gaivų pojūtį.

Tinka:

Kasdieniniam naudojimui visų tipų plaukams, ypač tiems, kurie susiduria su plaukų slinkimu ar galvos odos jautrumu.

products.name: MY.ORGANICS Hydrating Shampoo Sweet Fennel and Aloe
products.short_description: A gentle hydrating shampoo enriched with sweet fennel, aloe, lavender, and geranium essential oils. It cleanses, hydrates, and restores body and volume, leaving hair soft and manageable.
products.description:
Application:

Apply a small amount of shampoo to damp hair. Massage gently into the scalp and hair. Leave for 1 minute, then rinse thoroughly with warm water. Towel dry and style as desired.

Features and Benefits:

This gentle hydrating shampoo cleanses without stripping natural oils, making it ideal for dry, damaged, and chemically treated hair. It restores body, volume, and manageability, leaving hair soft and nourished. Sweet fennel: increases scalp firmness, soothes, and softens. Aloe vera: deeply hydrates and strengthens hair while invigorating the scalp. Lavender essential oil: relaxes and soothes, relieving minor scalp discomfort. Geranium essential oil: softens and enhances hair silkiness.

Suitable for:

Daily use on dry, stressed, and chemically treated hair.

products.lt_name: MY.ORGANICS Drėkinantis Šampūnas su Alijošiumi ir Pankoliu
products.lt_short_description: Švelnus drėkinamasis šampūnas su saldžiuoju pankoliu, alaviju, levanda ir pelargonijomis. Valo, drėkina ir atkuria plaukų apimtį, palikdamas juos minkštus ir lengvai tvarkomus.

Naudojimas:

Nedidelį kiekį šampūno paskirstykite ant drėgnų plaukų. Švelniai įmasažuokite į galvos odą ir plaukus. Palaikykite 1 minutę, tada kruopščiai nuplaukite šiltu vandeniu. Nusausinkite rankšluosčiu ir modeliuokite kaip įprasta.

Savybės ir privalumai:

Šis švelnus drėkinamasis šampūnas valo plaukus nepašalindamas natūralių aliejų, todėl jis idealiai tinka sausiems, pažeistiems ir chemiškai apdorotiems plaukams. Jis atkuria plaukų apimtį, suteikia minkštumo ir palengvina jų valdymą. Saldžiojo pankolio ekstraktas: stangrina, minkština ir ramina galvos odą. Alavijas: giliai drėkina, stiprina plaukus ir tonizuoja galvos odą. Levandų eterinis aliejus: atpalaiduoja ir ramina, mažina galvos odos diskomfortą. Pelargonijų eterinis aliejus: minkština plaukus ir suteikia jiems šilkinio švelnumo.

Tinka:

Kasdieniam naudojimui sausiems, pažeistiems ir chemiškai apdorotiems plaukams.

It helps keep hair moisturized and tangle-free, providing a lightweight, smooth finish that improves overall manageability.

products.name: Naturalmente Botanic Suncare Calming After Sun Cream
products.short_description: A soothing after-sun cream with a calming, relaxing effect that helps reduce redness and relieve discomfort, leaving skin feeling refreshed.
products.description:
Application:

Apply Naturalmente Botanic Suncare Calming After Sun Cream after each sunbathing session, gently massaging until fully absorbed.

Features and Benefits:

It calms sun-exposed skin by reducing redness and soothing irritation, helps relieve discomfort, and provides a pleasant cooling sensation — all while maintaining the skin's moisture balance and ensuring an easy, non-greasy application.

Suitable for daily use.

products.name: Essere My Holy Water Hydrating Face Mist
products.short_description: Hydrating and radiance-boosting facial mist enriched with hyaluronic acid, probiotics, and peptides.
products.description:
Application:

Spray the Essere My Holy Water hydrating face mist from a distance of about 20 cm onto the face, neck, and décolleté. Use in the morning and throughout the day as needed, even over makeup, to maintain skin hydration and freshness.

Features and Benefits:

This hydrating facial mist with hyaluronic acid, probiotics, and peptides deeply moisturizes, enhances skin radiance, and protects against dehydration. Its ultra-light formula instantly refreshes the skin, reduces fine lines, and provides a feeling of comfort. Regular use ensures smooth, refreshed, and radiant skin throughout the day.

Suitable for all skin types, especially dehydrated and tired skin in need of hydration and a radiant boost.

Naudojimas:

Purškite Essere My Holy Water drėkinančią veido dulksną iš maždaug 20 cm atstumo ant veido, kaklo ir dekoltė srities. Naudokite ryte ir dienos metu pagal poreikį, net ir ant makiažo, siekiant palaikyti odos drėgmę ir gaivumą.

Savybės ir privalumai:

Drėkinamoji veido dulksna su hialurono rūgštimi, probiotikais ir peptidais intensyviai drėkina, suteikia odai švytėjimo ir apsaugo nuo dehidratacijos. Jos itin lengva formulė akimirksniu atgaivina odą, mažina smulkias raukšleles ir suteikia komforto pojūtį. Reguliarus naudojimas užtikrina glotnią, gaiviai atrodančią* ir švytinčią odą visą dieną.

Tinka visų tipų odai, ypač dehidratavusiai, pavargusiai odai, siekiant ją atgaivinti ir suteikti švytėjimo.

Hydrating rose water with hyaluronic acid deeply moisturizes, tones, and soothes the skin. The extracts of four rose varieties (Damascena, Centifolia, Gallica, Canina) enhance elasticity, reduce redness, and protect against irritation. Regular use helps maintain healthy and radiant skin.

products.name: Essere Pure Skin Rebalancing Soothing Toner
products.short_description: Balancing and hydrating toner that supports skin microbiome health.
products.description:
Application:

Apply Essere Pure Skin Rebalancing Soothing Toner to a cotton pad and gently wipe over the face, neck, and décolleté. Use morning and evening on clean skin. Do not rinse.

Features and Benefits:

This purifying and hydrating toner helps balance the skin, reduce redness, and support a healthy skin barrier. Enriched with Niacinamide  to even out skin tone and improve elasticity. Lactobacillus ferment strengthens the skin’s microbiome, while natural extracts like Chamomile, Mallow, and Burdock Root calm the skin and help reduce irritation.

The result is soft, fresh, and radiant skin.

Suitable for:

All skin types, especially sensitive and dehydrated skin.

products.name: Essere Power Bright Illuminating Exfoliating Toner
products.short_description: Exfoliating and brightening toner for a radiant, even complexion.
products.description:
Application:

Apply the Essere Power Bright illuminating exfoliating toner to a cotton pad and gently sweep over the face, neck, and décolleté, avoiding the eye area. Use in the evening on clean skin. Do not rinse.

Features and Benefits:

A gentle exfoliating toner with mandelic acid, vitamin C, and hyaluronic acid that brightens, hydrates, and evens out skin tone. Encourages natural cell regeneration, revealing a smoother and more radiant complexion over time.

Suitable for:

Oily, combination, and mature skin - especially skin that appears dull, uneven, or tired-looking.

Užtepkite Essere Power Bright valomąjį skaistinantį tonikaą ant vatos diskelio ir švelniai perbraukite veidą, kaklą ir dekoltė sritį, vengiant akių zonos. Naudoti vakare ant švarios odos. Nenuskalauti.

Švelnus valomasis tonikas su mandelio rūgštimi, vitaminu C ir hialurono rūgštimi, kuris skaistina, drėkina ir lygina odos atspalvį. Skatina natūralią ląstelių regeneraciją, suteikia odai glotnumo ir švytėjimo.

Riebiai, mišriai ir brandžiai odai – ypač papilkėjusiai, netolygios spalvos ar pavargusiai odai.

products.name: Essere Blue Eyes Biphasic Eye Makeup Remover
products.short_description: Gentle yet effective dual-phase eye makeup remover for waterproof makeup.
products.description:
Application:

Before using the Essere Blue Eyes biphasic eye makeup remover, shake the bottle well to blend the two phases. Pour a small amount onto a cotton pad, gently press it onto the eyelid for a few seconds, and wipe delicately from top to bottom to remove makeup.

Features and Benefits:

A dual-phase makeup remover that effortlessly removes waterproof and long-lasting makeup while being gentle on sensitive eyes. Its oil phase dissolves stubborn makeup, while the water phase refreshes and soothes. Perfect for contact lens users and delicate skin.

Suitable for:

All skin types, especially sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers.

products.lt_name: Essere Blue Eyes Bifazinis Makiažo Valiklis
products.lt_short_description: Švelnus, tačiau efektyvus dvisluoksnis akių makiažo valiklis, skirtas atspariam makiažui pašalinti.

Naudojimas:

Prieš naudojant Essere Blue Eyes bizafinį makiažo valiklį gerai suplakite buteliuką, kad susimaišytų dvi fazės. Užpilkite nedidelį kiekį priemonės ant vatos diskelio, lengvai prispauskite prie vokų kelioms sekundėms ir švelniai nuvalykite makiažą judesiu iš viršaus į apačią.

Savybės ir privalumai:

Dvisluoksnis makiažo valiklis lengvai pašalina atsparų vandeniui ir ilgai išliekantį makiažą, švelniai prižiūrėdamas jautrias akis. Aliejinė fazė ištirpina net sunkiausiai nuvalomą makiažą, o vandeninė fazė atgaivina ir ramina odą. Puikiai tinka nešiojantiems kontaktinius lęšius ir jautriai odai.

Tinka:

Visų tipų odai, ypač jautrioms akims ir kontaktinių lęšių nešiotojams.

products.name: Essere Sweet Sugar 2 in 1 Face Scrub
products.short_description: Gently exfoliating and hydrating scrub for smooth, radiant skin.
products.description:
Application:

Gently massage the Essere Sweet Sugar 2 in 1 face scrub onto damp skin in circular motions, avoiding the eye area. Rinse thoroughly. For an intensive hydrating effect, leave on for 5 minutes before rinsing. Use no more than 1-2 times a week.

Features and Benefits:

A gentle exfoliating scrub that removes dead skin cells and enhances radiance while hydrating the skin. Its unique formula and plant oils and extracts nourish and soften the skin, helping to keep it healthy and glowing. The scrub can double as a moisturizing mask, leaving the skin smooth, soft, and glowing.

Suitable for:

All skin types, including sensitive skin.

Naudojimas:

Švelniai įmasažuokite Essere Sweet Sugar 2 in 1 veido šveitiklį į drėgną odą sukamaisiais judesiais, vengdami akių srities. Kruopščiai nuplaukite. Norėdami pasiekti intensyvesnį drėkinamąjį efektą, palikite priemonę 5 minutėms prieš nuplaudami. Naudokite ne dažniau kaip 1–2 kartus per savaitę.

Švelnus šveitiklis pašalina negyvas odos ląsteles, skaistina ir drėkina odą. Išskirtinė formulė su augaliniais aliejais ir ekstraktais maitina, minkština ir padeda išlaikyti sveiką bei švytinčią odą. Priemonę galima naudoti ir kaip drėkinamąją kaukę – ji palieka odą glotnią, švelnią ir spindinčią.

Visų tipų odai, įskaitant jautrią.

products.short_description: Nourishing cleansing balm for deep cleansing and hydration.
products.description:
Application:

Take a small amount of Essere All Clean cleansing balm and apply to dry face, neck, and décolleté. Add warm water to emulsify into a delicate, milky texture, gently massage, and rinse thoroughly.

Features and Benefits:

A nourishing cleansing balm that removes stubborn makeup, excess sebum, and impurities while preserving the skin’s natural moisture barrier. It leaves the skin perfectly clean, refreshed, and hydrated without causing dryness.

Suitable for:

All skin types, especially dry and sensitive skin.

products.name: Essere My Cloud Cleansing Mousse
products.short_description: Hydrating and soothing mousse cleanser for soft, refreshed skin.
products.description:
Application:

Dispense a small amount of Essere My Cloud Cleansing Mousse and apply to the face, neck, and décolleté. Gently massage in circular motions, then rinse thoroughly with water.

Features and Benefits:

A gentle, hydrating facial cleanser with a soft, airy mousse texture. It effectively removes makeup residue, impurities, and excess oil without stripping the skin’s natural moisture barrier. Niacinamide helps even out skin tone, strengthen the skin barrier, and reduce redness, while hyaluronic acid provides deep hydration and plumps the skin.

Leaves your skin feeling fresh, smooth, and comfortably soft.

Suitable for:

All skin types, especially delicate and sensitive skin.

products.name: Essere My Eye Bomb 3-in-1 Eye Contour
products.short_description: Hydrating and rejuvenating eye contour treatment for a brighter, refreshed look.

Application:

Apply a small amount of the Essere My Eye Bomb 3-in-1 Eye Contour gently around the eye contour area. Use morning and evening for a fresher, smoother, and brighter look.

Features and Benefits:

A global 3-in-1 eye contour treatment that deeply hydrates, soothes, and decongests the delicate eye area. Enriched with key ingredients: Niacinamide: Brightens dark circles and evens skin tone. Caffeine: Reduces puffiness and refreshes tired eyes. Peptides: Smooth fine lines and improve skin firmness. Hyaluronic Acid: Deeply hydrates for a plump, youthful look.

This innovative formula revitalizes tired eyes, providing a refreshed, radiant appearance. 

Suitable for:

All skin types, including sensitive skin, and for both young and mature skin.

products.name: Essere Skin Perfect Brightening Face Serum

products.description:
Application:

Apply the Essere Skin Perfect Brightening Face Serum to cleansed face, neck, and décolleté, massaging in circular motions until fully absorbed. Use alone or with your favorite moisturizer for enhanced results.

Features and Benefits:

A brightening face serum enriched with niacinamide, peptides, and acetylated hyaluronic acid to improve skin tone, hydration, and firmness. It reduces hyperpigmentation, evens out complexion, and helps prevent new discolorations and imperfections. Leaves skin smooth, radiant, and youthful-looking with regular use.

Suitable for:

All skin types, especially those with uneven skin tone and hyperpigmentation concerns.

Šviesinamasis veido serumas su niacinamidu, peptidais ir acetiluota hialurono rūgštimi, kuris gerina odos toną, drėkina ir stiprina odos elastingumą. Sumažina hiperpigmentaciją, tolygina odos atspalvį ir padeda išvengti naujų dėmių atsiradimo. Reguliarus naudojimas suteikia odai glotnumo, švytėjimo ir jaunatviškumo.

Tinka:

Visų tipų odai, ypač turinčiai netolygų atspalvį ir hiperpigmentaciją.

products.name: Essere Radiance Elixir Illuminating Face Serum
products.short_description: A deeply hydrating and nourishing serum enriched with vitamins and antioxidants to restore skin moisture, elasticity, and radiance.
products.description:
Application:

Apply the Essere Radiance Elixir Illuminating Face Serum to cleansed face, neck, and décolleté until fully absorbed. Use alone or with your favorite moisturizer to boost hydration and nourishment. Ideal for daily use.

Features and Benefits:

This intensely hydrating and illuminating face serum is designed to visibly improve uneven skin tone, wrinkles, and loss of firmness. Enriched with peptides, vitamin C, acetylated hyaluronic acid, ginseng, and niacinamide, it enhances the skin’s natural radiance and beauty. The serum provides deep hydration, leaving the skin soft and plump, while nourishing and protecting against environmental stressors and premature aging.

Suitable for:

All skin types, particularly dry and dehydrated skin in need of extra nourishment.

products.lt_short_description: Giliai drėkinantis ir maitinantis serumas, praturtintas vitaminais ir antioksidantais, atkuriantis odos drėgmę, elastingumą ir švytėjimą.

Naudojimas:

Tepkite Essere "Radiance Elixir" Skaistinantį Veido Serumą ant švarios veido, kaklo ir dekoltė srities odos, kol visiškai įsigers. Naudokite vieną arba kartu su mėgstamu drėkinamuoju kremu, siekiant sustiprinti drėkinimą ir maitinimą. Idealiai tinka kasdieniam naudojimui.

Savybės ir privalumai:

Šis intensyviai drėkinantis ir švytėjimą suteikiantis veido serumas skirtas pastebimai pagerinti netolygų odos atspalvį, sumažinti raukšles ir pagerinti stangrumą. Praturtintas peptidais, vitaminu C, acetiluota hialurono rūgštimi, ženšenio ir niacinamido ekstraktais, serumas suteikia odai natūralų švytėjimą ir grožį. Serumas giliai drėkina, palikdamas odą minkštą ir elastingą, maitina bei apsaugo nuo aplinkos streso ir priešlaikinio senėjimo.

Tinka:

Visų tipų odai, ypač sausai ir dehidratuotai odai, kuriai reikia papildomo maitinimo.

products.name: Essere Miracle Glow Enzymatic Peel
products.short_description: A gentle enzymatic peel that exfoliates, refines texture, and enhances radiance, leaving the skin smooth and glowing.
products.description:
Application:

Apply a thin layer of the Essere Miracle Glow Enzymatic Peel to cleansed face, neck, and décolleté using the provided brush. Leave on for a few minutes, then rinse thoroughly with water. Use regulary once a week.

Features and Benefits:

A gel-based enzymatic peel formulated with bromelain, papain (natural ferments) and hyaluronic acid to gently exfoliate, regenerate, and illuminate the skin. It effectively removes dead cells, impurities, and imperfections, refining the skin’s texture and enhancing its natural glow. 

Suitable for:

All skin types, especially those seeking gentle exfoliation and rejuvenation. Perfect for addressing dullness, blackheads, and fine lines.

products.lt_short_description: Švelnus fermentinis pilingas, kuris valo, lygina odą ir suteikia jai natūralų spindesį.
products.lt_description:
Naudojimas:

Plonu sluoksniu paskirstykite Essere "Miracle Glow" Enziminį Pilingą ant švarios veido, kaklo ir dekoltė odos naudodami pridėtą šepetėlį. Palikite kelioms minutėms, tada kruopščiai nuplaukite vandeniu. Geriausiems rezultatams pasiekti naudokite vieną kartą per savaitę, reaguliariai.

Savybės ir privalumai:

Gelinis fermentinis pilingas su bromelainu, papainu (natūralūs fermentai) ir hialurono rūgštimi švelniai eksfolijuoja, regeneruoja ir suteikia odai spindesio. Efektyviai pašalina negyvas ląsteles, nešvarumus ir netobulumus, lygina odos tekstūrą ir suteikia natūralų švytėjimą.

Tinka:

Visų tipų odai, ypač tiems, kurie siekia švelnaus valymo ir odos atgaivinimo. Puikiai tinka kovojant su odos papilkėjimu, inkštirais ir smulkiomis linijomis.

products.name: Essere Amazing Anti-Age Gel Mask
products.short_description: A refreshing gel mask that hydrates, lifts, and revitalizes the skin, leaving it smooth, firm, and radiant.
products.description:
Application:

Apply the Essere Amazing Anti-Age Gel Mask evenly to the face, neck, and décolleté using the provided brush. Leave it on for 15 minutes, then rinse thoroughly with warm water. Gently pat dry and follow with your usual skincare routine. Use 1–2 times per week for best results.

Features and Benefits:

A fresh, gel-based face mask enriched with acetylated hyaluronic acid, peptides, and natural active ingredients that deeply hydrate and plump the skin. It instantly reduces signs of fatigue and aging, leaving the skin firm, smooth, and rejuvenated. The mask provides a lifting effect, improves skin tone, and gives a refreshed, radiant complexion.

Suitable for:

All skin types, especially those seeking to combat stress, fatigue, and signs of aging while improving hydration and firmness.

Tolygiai paskirstykite Essere "Amazing Anti-Age" Gelię Kaukę ant veido, kaklo ir dekoltė odos naudodami pridėtą šepetėlį. Palikite 15 minučių, tada kruopščiai nuplaukite šiltu vandeniu. Švelniai nusausinkite odą ir tęskite įprastą odos priežiūros rutiną. Naudokite 1–2 kartus per savaitę.

Gaivi gelinė veido kaukė su acetilinta hialurono rūgštimi, peptidais ir natūraliais aktyviais ingredientais giliai drėkina ir suteikia odai putlumo. Akimirksniu mažina nuovargio bei senėjimo požymius, suteikdama odai stangrumo, glotnumo ir jaunatvišką išvaizdą. Kaukė suteikia liftingo efektą, gerina odos tonusą ir suteikia švytėjimą.

Visų tipų odai, ypač toms, kurios nori kovoti su stresu, nuovargiu ir senėjimo požymiais, gerinant odos drėkinimą bei stangrumą.

products.name: Essere Déjà Blue Anti–Fatigue Eye Mask
products.short_description: An anti-aging eye mask that hydrates, firms, and refreshes the delicate eye area for a youthful and radiant look.
products.description:
Application:

Apply a thin layer of the Essere Déjà Blue Anti–Fatigue Eye Mask to the clean eye contour area using the provided brush. Leave it on for 15 minutes, then rinse thoroughly with warm water. Use 1–2 times per week for best results.

Features and Benefits:

A revitalizing and anti-aging eye mask enriched with hyaluronic acid, azulene, caffeine, and peptides. It deeply hydrates, smooths fine lines, and reduces puffiness, leaving the eye area looking refreshed, firm, and luminous. The unique formula helps to minimize the signs of fatigue and aging, restoring a youthful and well-rested appearance in just 15 minutes.

Suitable for:

All skin types, especially for tired eyes with visible signs of aging, puffiness, and dehydration.

products.name: Essere Perfect Balance Face Cream
products.short_description: A balancing face cream that hydrates, regulates sebum production, and leaves a matte finish, ideal for combination and acne-prone skin.
products.description:
Application:

Apply a thin layer of the Essere Perfect Balance Face Cream to clean skin, gently massaging in circular motions until fully absorbed. Use on the face, neck, and décolleté in the morning and evening for optimal results.

Features and Benefits:

A balancing face cream with natural marine extracts, probiotics, salicylic acid, and hyaluronic acid. It helps to regulate sebum production, deeply hydrate the skin, and support regeneration. The formula controls excess oil, leaving the skin with a matte, smooth, and comfortable finish while enhancing the skin’s microbiome for long-term balance.

Suitable for:

Combination and acne-prone skin, especially for those looking to reduce oiliness while maintaining hydration and comfort.

products.name: Essere Defence Me Anti-Age Face Cream SPF 30

Apply a thin layer of Essere Defence Me Anti-Age Face Cream SPF 30 to clean skin, gently massaging in circular motions until fully absorbed. Use on the face, neck, and décolleté in the morning for optimal protection.

An anti-aging face cream with SPF 30 that hydrates, soothes, and protects the skin from UV rays and environmental damage. Formulated with a powerful antioxidant complex, it helps fight free radicals, promotes cell regeneration, and maintains youthful, firm, and luminous skin. The cream effectively prevents the appearance of wrinkles, fine lines, and dark spots.

Suitable for:

Tepkite ploną Essere "Defence Me Anti-Age" Veido Krema SPF 30 sluoksnį ant švarios odos, švelniai masažuodami sukamaisiais judesiais, kol visiškai įsigers. Naudokite veidui, kaklui ir dekoltė sričiai ryte, siekiant optimalios apsaugos.

products.name: Essere Vitamin C Power C50
products.short_description: Brightening and antioxidant tablets that help reduce spots and signs of aging while enhancing skin radiance.
products.description:
Application:

Add 5 ml of water to the provided measuring cup, place one Essere Vitamin C Power C50 tablet into the water, and shake until fully dissolved. Apply the resulting liquid directly to the face, neck, and décolleté or mix with your favorite skincare product. Use 1-2 times a week for best results.

Features and Benefits:

Power C50 tablets are formulated with Vitamin C, ferulic acid, and hydrolyzed hyaluronic acid to brighten and even out skin tone. They help reduce dark spots and signs of aging while delivering powerful antioxidant protection. With regular use, skin appears more radiant, smooth, and youthful.

Suitable for:

All skin types, especially those with uneven skin tone, dark spots, or signs of aging.

products.meta_description: Brighten skin with Essere Vitamin C Power C50 tablets. Vitamin C, ferulic acid, and hyaluronic acid reduce dark spots, fight aging, and boost radiance.
products.lt_short_description: Skaistinančios ir antioksidacinės tabletės, padedančios sumažinti pigmentines dėmes ir senėjimo požymius bei suteikiančios odai švytėjimo.
products.lt_description:
Naudojimas:

Į pridėtą matavimo indelį įpilkite 5 ml vandens, įdėkite vieną Essere Vitamin C Power C50 tabletę ir suplakite, kol visiškai ištirps. Gautą skystį užtepkite tiesiai ant veido, kaklo ir dekoltė srities arba sumaišykite su mėgstamu odos priežiūros produktu. Naudokite tik kartą per savaitę, kad pasiektumėte geriausių rezultatų.

Savybės ir privalumai:

Power C50 tabletės, praturtintos vitaminu C, feruline rūgštimi ir hidrolizuota hialurono rūgštimi, skaistina ir tolygina odos atspalvį. Jos padeda sumažinti pigmentines dėmes ir senėjimo požymius, užtikrindamos stiprią antioksidacinę apsaugą. Reguliariai naudojant oda tampa švytinti, lygi ir jaunatviška.

Tinka:

Visų tipų odai, ypač turintiems netolygų odos atspalvį, pigmentines dėmes ar senėjimo požymių.

products.name: Essere Be Body Shower Gel Vitamin E
products.short_description: Gentle, regenerative shower gell enriched with vitamin E.
products.description:
Application:

Apply the product to the palm of your hand or a water-soaked sponge. Gently massage in circular motions until a soft foam forms, then rinse thoroughly.

Features and Benefits:

The high-quality active ingredients, combined with a dermatologically compatible formula designed for deep hydration, stimulate and nourish the skin, regenerating it completely. A gentle shower gel enriched with pure Vitamin E and organic extracts of chamomile, calendula, hawthorn, and oat. Its soft and light foam, paired with an intense and fragrant aroma, creates a delightful cleansing experience. Regular use restores the skin's natural balance, leaving it healthier, hydrated, and toned.

products.short_description: Regenerating and nourishing hands mask.
products.description:
Application:

Apply a generous amount of the product to dry hands, cover them with cotton gloves, and leave on for about an hour, or even overnight. Repeat application daily as needed.

Features and Benefits:

The formula includes polyglutamic acid, a standout ingredient in modern cosmetic formulations, known for its intense hydration and ability to reduce water loss in the dermis. In combination with other active ingredients (hyaluronic acid, cocoa butter, shea butter, urea, mango juice, and passionflower), it instantly promotes smoother, nourished, plumped, and revitalized skin.

This antioxidant shampoo is enriched with concentrated Vitamin C and organic extracts of blueberry, lemon, green tea, and goji berries. products.name: Essere Be Hair Co–Wash
products.short_description: A cleansing and conditioning co-wash with natural extracts that leaves hair soft, shiny, and purified in one step.
products.description:
Application:

On wet hair, apply the necessary amount of product and distribute it evenly across the scalp and hair. Massage thoroughly as you would with a shampoo, then leave it on for a few minutes like a conditioner to achieve cleansing, conditioning, purifying, and nourishing benefits. Rinse thoroughly and proceed with drying.

Features and Benefits:

This innovative co-wash method combines cleansing and conditioning in a single step, offering a healthy shine and strength to your hair. The hybrid formula deeply cleanses while providing the nourishing effects of a high-quality conditioner. Enriched with sweet almond oil, citrus, and cornflower extracts, along with cane sugar, it gently cleanses while adding volume, brilliance, and softness. Silicone-free and foam-free, it purifies the scalp while leaving hair irresistibly soft and manageable. Perfect for frequent use and as an alternative to traditional shampoo.

Suitable for:

All hair types, especially for those who wash their hair frequently or seek a gentle, sulfate-free cleansing option.

products.lt_short_description: Šampūnas ir kondicionierius viename su natūraliais ekstraktais, kuris vienu žingsniu išvalo, maitina ir suteikia plaukams žvilgesio bei minkštumo.
products.lt_description:
Naudojimas:

Ant drėgnų plaukų užtepkite reikiamą kiekį produkto ir tolygiai paskirstykite ant galvos odos bei plaukų. Kruopščiai įmasažuokite kaip šampūną, palikite kelioms minutėms kaip kondicionierių, kad plaukai būtų išvalyti, pamaitinti ir sudrėkinti. Gerai išskalaukite ir tęskite plaukų džiovinimą.

Savybės ir privalumai:

Šis inovatyvus galvos plovimo metodas vienu žingsniu apjungia plaukų valymą ir kondicionavimą, suteikdamas plaukams natūralų žvilgesį ir stiprumą. Hibridinė formulė giliai valo, tuo pačiu suteikdama aukštos kokybės kondicionieriaus maitinamąjį poveikį. Praturtintas migdolų aliejumi, citrusų ir rugiagėlių ekstraktais bei cukranendrių cukrumi, šis produktas švelniai valo, suteikia plaukams apimties, žvilgesio ir minkštumo. Be silikono ir putojančių ingredientų, jis švelniai valo galvos odą ir palieka plaukus nepaprastai minkštus ir lengvai formuojamus. Puikiai tinka dažnam naudojimui ir kaip alternatyva tradiciniam šampūnui.

Tinka:

Visų tipų plaukams, ypač tiems, kurie dažnai plauna plaukus arba ieško švelnaus, be sulfatų valomojo sprendimo.

Perfect for dry, damaged, and treated hair that needs extra care and radiance.

Apply to wet hair, massage gently for a few minutes until a light foam forms, then rinse thoroughly. Suitable for daily use.

All hair types, including sensitive scalps. Ideal for daily use by the whole family.

products.name: Gentleman Captain Beard Mask
products.short_description: A moisturizing and softening beard mask enriched with plant extracts to control frizz, volume, and provide deep nourishment for a well-groomed and manageable beard.

Application:

Apply the product to damp beard hair, ensuring even distribution. Leave it on for 3-5 minutes to allow the ingredients to penetrate, then rinse thoroughly and dry. For best results, use regularly.

Features and Benefits:

This moisturizing beard mask is specially designed to provide deep hydration, control volume, and prevent frizz. Enriched with walnut and henna extracts, it strengthens the beard while aloe vera, chamomile, and mallow extracts soothe and nourish. The formula effectively softens thick and unruly beards, leaving them manageable, shiny, and healthy-looking.

Suitable for:

Thick and unruly beards in need of hydration, softness, and volume control.

Naudojimas:

Užtepkite produktą ant drėgnos barzdos, tolygiai paskirstykite. Palikite 3-5 minutėms, kad kaukė įsigertų, tuomet kruopščiai nuplaukite ir nusausinkite. Norint pasiekti geriausius rezultatus, naudokite reguliariai.

Ši drėkinamoji barzdos kaukė yra sukurta giliai drėkinti, kontroliuoti apimtį ir šalinti nepageidaujamą garbanojimąsi. Application:

Apply a generous layer of the mask evenly over the entire face, avoiding the eye and lip areas. Leave it on for 10-15 minutes to allow the active ingredients to work, then rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water. Use once a week for best results.

Features and Benefits:

This detoxifying facial mask with white clay deeply cleanses the skin, promoting cell renewal and oxygenation of tissues. Enriched with active compounds of juniper, myrtle, and coffee, it helps remove impurities, absorb excess oil, and revitalize the skin, leaving it smooth and refreshed. The natural ingredients work to purify and nourish, making it suitable for all skin types.

Suitable for:

All skin types, especially those in need of deep cleansing, detoxification, and revitalization.

Užtepkite storą kaukės sluoksnį tolygiai ant viso veido, vengdami akių ir lūpų zonos. Palikite 10-15 minučių, kad veikliosios medžiagos įsigertų, tuomet kruopščiai nuplaukite šiltu vandeniu. Naudokite kartą per savaitę geriausiems rezultatams pasiekti.

Detoksikuojanti veido kaukė su baltuoju moliu giliai valo odą, skatina ląstelių atsinaujinimą ir audinių prisotinimą deguonimi. After washing, apply to a damp beard and dry thoroughly. For dry beards, apply a few drops to strengthen the hair and enhance shine.

This beard oil, formulated with a blend of argan and sunflower oils, strengthens and softens the beard, leaving it shiny and manageable. Free from petrolatum and silicones, it offers a lightweight, non-greasy feel.

All beard types, especially for those looking to grow and maintain a healthy, long beard.

All beard types, especially those looking for hydration, softness, and healthy beard growth.

Wash the beard only once a day, applying the shampoo along the length of the beard. Gently massage to create a light foam, leave on for a few minutes, then rinse thoroughly.

This beard shampoo gently cleanses without irritating the skin, thanks to its plant-based surfactants. Enriched with aloe vera extract and tea tree essential oil, it provides a reconstructive and relaxing effect, restoring the skin’s hydrolipid balance. The tea tree oil offers antibacterial and disinfectant properties, ensuring excellent hygiene and leaving the beard soft, shiny, and pleasantly fragrant.

All beard types, especially those prone to dryness and irritation. Ideal for daily use to maintain cleanliness, balance, and shine.

Paskirstykite šampūną per visą barzdos ilgį. Švelniai įmasažuokite, kol susidarys lengva puta, palaikykite keletą minučių ir kruopščiai išskalaukite. Naudokite vieną kartą per dieną.

products.name: Naturalmente Wellness Color Pigmented Conditioner Warm Blond
products.short_description: Pigmented conditioner refreshes hair color and revitalizes shine.
products.description:
Application:

Apply and massage the “Wellness Color” shampoo into the hair. Towel dry to remove excess moisture. For short or medium-length hair, apply “Wellness Color” with a tint brush, distributing evenly through the mid-lengths and ends. For long hair, apply “Wellness Color” from roots to ends like a regular mask, using gloves. Detangle the hair and evenly distribute the product with your hands, then comb through again with a tint brush. Leave on for 10 minutes and rinse thoroughly with plenty of water. It is recommended to use gloves.

The conditioner is suitable for hair tones 7.0-9.0.
products.ingredients: Aqua (water), myristyl alcohol, cetyl alcohol, cetrimonium chloride, carmellia japonica seed oil, carthamus tinctorius seed oil (carthamus tinctorius (safflower) seed oil), orbignya speciosa kemel oil, hydrolyzed verbascum thapsus flower, punica granatum bark extract, astrocaryum murumuru seed butter, lycium barbarum fruit extract, polyglyceryl-4 caprate, citrus aurantium amara flower oil (citrus aurantium amara (bitter orange) flower oil), polyglyceryl-3 ricinoleate, benzyl alcohol, glycerin, dehydroacetic acid, tetrasodium glutamate diacetate, linalool, tocopherol, citric acid, geraniol, hydroxycitronellal, sodium benzoate, potassium sorbate, basic brown 16, basic yellow 87, 3-nitro-p-hydroxyethylaminophenol, basic brown 17, basic blue 99.
products.lt_name: Naturalmente Wellness Color Pigmentinis Kondicionierius "Warm Blond"
products.lt_short_description: Plaukų spalvą atgaivinantis ir žvilgesį suteikiantis pigmentinis kondicionierius.
products.lt_description:
Naudojimas:

Užtepkite ir įmasažuokite „Wellness Color“ šampūną. Nusausinkite plaukus rankšluosčiu, kad pašalintumėte drėgmės perteklių. Trumpiems ar vidutinio ilgio plaukams tepkite „Wellness Color“ dažų šepetėliu, tolygiai paskirstydami per vidurinę plaukų dalį ir galiukus. Ilgiems plaukams tepkite „Wellness Color“ nuo šaknų iki galiukų kaip įprastą kaukę, naudodami pirštines. Iššukuokite plaukus ir tolygiai paskirstykite produktą rankomis, tada dar kartą iššukuokite dažų šepetėliu. Palikite 10 minučių ir kruopščiai išskalaukite dideliu kiekiu vandens. Rekomenduojama naudoti su pirštinėmis.

Kondicionierių naudoti 7.0-9.0 tono plaukams.

products.name: Naturalmente Fortify Treatment
products.short_description: 4-FORTIFY is a trichological lotion formulated with active Glutathione and organic extracts to regenerate and revitalize weak hair, promoting a fuller and healthier appearance.
products.description:
Application:

For best results, apply 4-FORTIFY in the evening by gently massaging the ampoule contents onto a dry scalp, focusing on areas where hair loss is evident. Allow the lotion to fully absorb without rinsing, so the active ingredients can work overnight to regenerate hair follicles.

Features and Benefits:

4-FORTIFY is enriched with bioactive Glutathione and certified organic extracts of Chamomile, Flax, Coffee, and Millet. This powerful blend helps counteract hair thinning, rejuvenates aging follicular cells, and protects the scalp from environmental pollutants, resulting in fuller, healthier-looking hair.

Suitable For:

This trichological lotion is ideal for individuals experiencing weak or thinning hair due to aging, seasonal changes, or specific hair conditions. It is perfect for anyone seeking to strengthen their hair and enhance its vitality, especially when used in combination with Revitalizing treatments.
products.ingredients: Alcohol denat., Aqua, Propanediol, Etoxydiglicol, Olea Europaealeaf extract, Linum usatissimum seed extract, Chamomilla recutita flower extract, Coffea Arabica seed extract, Panicum miliaceum seed extract, potassiumGlutatione Isomerized linoleate, SodiumDNA, Glycerin, Metil nicotinate, Sodium bicarbonate, Lactic acid, Sodium benzoate, potassium sorbate, PotassiumChloride.
products.lt_name: Naturalmente Fortify Ampulės Nuo Plaukų Slinkimo
products.lt_short_description: 4-FORTIFY yra trichologinis losjonas, sukurtas su aktyviu glutationu ir ekologiškais ekstraktais, skirtas atgaivinti ir sustiprinti silpnus plaukus, suteikiant jiems tankesnę bei sveikesnę išvaizdą.
products.lt_description:
Naudojimas:

Geriausiems rezultatams 4-FORTIFY naudokite vakarais – švelniai masažuokite ampulės turinį ant sausos galvos odos, ypač tose vietose, kur pastebima plaukų slinkimo tendencija. Leiskite losjonui visiškai įsiskverbti, nenuplaukdami, kad aktyviosios medžiagos galėtų veikti visą naktį ir skatinti folikulų regeneraciją.

Savybės ir Privalumai:

4-FORTIFY yra praturtintas biologiniu aktyviu glutationu ir ekologiškais ramunėlių, linų, kavos bei proso ekstraktais. Šis galingas mišinys padeda kovoti su plaukų plonėjimu, atsinaujinti senstančius folikulus ir apsaugoti galvos odą nuo aplinkos taršos, suteikdamas plaukams tankesnę bei sveikesnę išvaizdą.

Tinka:

Šis trichologinis losjonas puikiai tinka silpniems ar slinkti pradėjusiems plaukams. Rekomenduojamas visiems, siekiantiems sustiprinti plaukus ir pagerinti jų gyvybingumą, ypač naudojant kartu su Revitalizing produktais.

products.name: Naturalmente Revitalizing Conditionier
products.short_description: Strengthening anti-hair loss conditioner.
products.description:
Application:

Wash hair with Revitalizing shampoo rinse and pat dry. Apply an appropriate amount of product treatment and leave it on for a few minutes. Rinse thoroughly and dry.

Features and Benefits:

Strengthens fine and weak hair with caffeine extract, guarana extract, and glutathione a powerful natural water-soluble antioxidant that is well tolerated by all skin types. This combination of active ingredients promotes hair growth and prevents hair loss. Caffeine and guarana strengthen weakened roots. Essential oils of lavender and eucalyptus purify the scalp and fortify the hair shaft. For a strengthening and anti-hair loss ritual, combine the conditioner with the shampoo and ampoules from the same Revitalizing Scalp Treatment line.

For weak and fine hair.
products.ingredients: Aqua, Cetyl alcohol, Stearyl alcohol, Eucaliptus globulus leaf oil, Lavandula angustifolia oil, Camelia sinensis leaf oil (*), Ilex paraguariensis leaf extract (*). Paulli/fa cupana seed extract (*). Coffea arabica (Coffee) seed extract(*). Olea europaea leaf extract, S-Arachidonoy//Linolenoyl/Linoleoyl Glutathione, Dipalmitoyelethylhydroxyetylmoniummethosulfate,Behnamidopro- pyldimethilamine,Glycerin,Benzylalcohol,Lacticacid,Potassiumsorbate,Sodium benzoate, Linalool, Limonene. *procedentes de agricultura bio certificada
products.lt_short_description: Stiprinamasis kondicionierius nuo plaukų slinkimo.
products.lt_description:
Naudojimas:

Išplaukite plaukus su „Revitalizing“ šampūnu, išskalaukite ir nusausinkite rankšluosčiu. Užtepkite tinkamą kiekį kondicionieriaus ir palikite kelioms minutėms. Kruopščiai išskalaukite ir išdžiovinkite plaukus.

Savybės ir privalumai:

Kondicionierius stiprina plonus ir silpnus plaukus, praturtintas kofeino ekstraktu, guaranos ekstraktu ir glutationu – galingu natūraliu, vandenyje tirpiu antioksidantu, tinkamu visų tipų odai. Šis aktyviųjų ingredientų derinys skatina plaukų augimą ir padeda išvengti plaukų slinkimo. Kofeinas ir guarana stiprina susilpnėjusias plaukų šaknis. Levandų ir eukalipto eteriniai aliejai valo galvos odą ir stiprina plaukų struktūrą. Norint pasiekti geriausius rezultatus, rekomenduojama naudoti kartu su šampūnu ir ampulėmis iš „Revitalizing Scalp Treatment“ linijos.

Tinka silpniems ir ploniems plaukams.

products.name: Naturalmente Revitalizing Shampoo
products.short_description: Revitalizing and moisturizing shampoo for hair loss prone hair.
products.description:
Application:

Distribute the shampoo evenly on the hair, emulsify, and rinse thoroughly with water.

Features and Benefits:

This strengthening shampoo is formulated with coffee and guarana extracts, which reinforce hair roots and promote healthy growth. Eucalyptus and lavender essential oils cleanse the scalp and enhance stimulation, creating a refreshing and invigorating effect. Formuated with Glutathione, which is a powerful antioxidant that helps protect hair from oxidative stress. Research conducted by Florence's University of Surgery has shown that, when combined with other active ingredients, glutathione can extend the hair growth cycle and reduce hair loss.

Suitable for weak and fine hair prone to hair loss.
products.ingredients: Aqua, Sodiun coceth sulfate, Cocomidoprpyl betaine, Eucalyptus globus leaf oil, Lavandula angustifolia, Camelia sinensis leaf extract, Ilex paraguariensis leaf extract, Paullinia cupana seed extract (*), Coffea arabica (Coffee) seed extract (*), Olea europaea (Olive) leaf extract, S-Arachidonoyl/linolenoy/Linoleol Glutathione, Dipamitoylethyl hydroxyethylmonium methosulfate, Behenamidopropyl dimethylamine, Glycerin, Benzyl alcohol, Lactic acid, Potassium sorbate, Sodium benzoate, Linalool, Limonene.

products.lt_description:
Naudojimas:

Tolygiai paskirstykite šampūną ant plaukų, švelniai įmasažuokite iki putų susidarymo ir kruopščiai išskalaukite vandeniu.

Savybės ir privalumai:

Šis stiprinamasis šampūnas praturtintas kavos ir guaranos ekstraktais, kurie stiprina plaukų šaknis ir skatina sveiką augimą. Levandų ir eukalipto eteriniai aliejai valo galvos odą ir skatina stimuliaciją, suteikdami gaivumo ir energijos pojūtį.

Formulėje taip pat yra glutationo – galingo antioksidanto, kuris padeda apsaugoti plaukus nuo oksidacinio streso. Florencijos chirurgijos universiteto tyrimai parodė, kad kartu su kitomis veikliosiomis medžiagomis glutationas gali prailginti plaukų augimo ciklą ir sumažinti plaukų slinkimą.

Tinka silpniems ir ploniems plaukams, linkusiems į slinkimą.

products.name: Naturalmente Revitalizing Scalp Treatment
products.short_description: Hair regrowth ampoules.
products.description:
Application:

In the evening, apply the contents of the ampoule to dry scalp areas where hair loss is noticeable. Gently massage with fingertips and allow it to absorb. Do not rinse.

Features and Benefits:

REVITALIZING SCALP TREATMENT is a plant-based hair regrowth solution formulated with OLEUROPEIN and RENOVASE, which strengthen the hair and prevent thinning. Olive leaf extract and B-sitosterol improve scalp condition, stimulate follicle cell proliferation, and accelerate the hair growth phase. Clinically proven, this product is non-irritating, has no side effects, and provides long-lasting results.

Suitable for:

People experiencing hair loss, androgenetic alopecia, or patchy baldness. Ideal for strengthening hair growth and improving hair density.

Vakare tepkite ampulės turinį ant sausos galvos odos tose vietose, kur pastebimas plaukų slinkimas. Švelniai įmasažuokite pirštų galiukais ir palikite įsigerti. Nenuskalauti.

Savybės ir privalumai:

REVITALIZING SCALP TREATMENT – tai augalinės kilmės plaukų atauginimo priemonė, sukurta su OLEUROPEINU ir RENOVASE, kurie stiprina plaukus ir stabdo jų retėjimą. Alyvmedžio lapų ekstraktas ir B-sitosterolis gerina galvos odos būklę, skatina folikulų ląstelių dauginimąsi ir spartina plaukų augimo fazę. Produktas yra kliniškai patvirtintas, nedirgina odos, neturi pašalinio poveikio ir užtikrina ilgalaikius rezultatus.

Tinka žmonėms, susiduriantiems su plaukų slinkimu, androgenetine alopecija ar židininio plikimo problemomis. Idealiai tinka stiprinant plaukų augimą ir pagerinant jų tankumą.

products.name: Naturalmente Jojoba Oil
products.short_description: Deeply moisturizing jojoba oil.
products.description:
Features and Benefits:

Promoting Hair Growth

The scalp secretes natural oils or sebum to retain hair moisture. Excessive sebum can clog hair follicles, potentially causing hair loss, slowing hair growth, or leading to other issues. Jojoba oil cleanses and opens up hair follicles, encouraging the growth of new hair cells. You can use this oil for a warm oil treatment—massage it well into the scalp before shampooing to enhance blood circulation and stimulate hair growth.

As a Conditioner

Massage a few drops of jojoba oil into damp hair to nourish it, retain moisture, and soften it. To make hair more manageable, rub a few drops into your hands and comb through your hair with your fingers.

For Dry Scalp

A dry scalp is a common cause of dandruff. Jojoba oil moisturizes and balances the scalp's pH level.

For Oily Scalp

Jojoba oil regulates sebum secretion in the scalp and improves the circulation of oils in clogged pores, reducing and controlling hair oiliness. Conventional products for oily scalp tend to dry out the hair, but jojoba oil maintains moisture balance without drying.
products.ingredients: Simmondsia californica
products.lt_short_description: Giliai drėkinantis simondsijų (jojoba) aliejus.
products.lt_description:
Savybės ir privalumai:

Skatina plaukų augimą

Galvos oda išskiria natūralius aliejus arba sebumą, kurie padeda išlaikyti plaukų drėgmę. Perteklinis sebumo kiekis gali užkimšti plaukų folikulus, dėl ko gali atsirasti plaukų slinkimas, sulėtėti augimas ar kilti kitos problemos. Jojobos aliejus valo ir atveria plaukų folikulus, skatindamas naujų plaukų ląstelių augimą. Šį aliejų galima naudoti kaip šiltą aliejinę procedūrą – gerai įmasažuokite į galvos odą prieš plaunant šampūnu, kad pagerintumėte kraujotaką ir paskatintumėte plaukų augimą.

Kaip kondicionierius

Įmasažuokite kelis lašus jojobos aliejaus į drėgnus plaukus, kad juos pamaitintumėte, išlaikytumėte drėgmę ir suminkštintumėte. Norėdami palengvinti plaukų iššukavimą, įtrinkite kelis lašus į delnus ir perbraukite per plaukus pirštais.

Sausai galvos odai

Sausa galvos oda yra viena pagrindinių pleiskanų atsiradimo priežasčių. Jojobos aliejus intensyviai drėkina ir subalansuoja galvos odos pH lygį.

Riebiai galvos odai

Jojobos aliejus reguliuoja sebumo išsiskyrimą galvos odoje ir pagerina aliejų cirkuliaciją užsikimšusiose porose, mažindamas bei kontroliuodamas plaukų riebalavimąsi. Įprasti produktai, skirti riebiai galvos odai, dažnai išsausina plaukus, tačiau jojobos aliejus padeda išlaikyti drėgmės balansą, nesausindamas plaukų.
products.lt_ingredients: Simmondsia californica

products.name: Naturalmente WOW Macassar Fluid
products.short_description: Shine-enhancing hair fluid.
products.description:
Application:

Apply a small amount of the product to damp or dry hair, distributing it evenly throughout the length, paying special attention to the ends. Do not rinse.

Features and Benefits:

WOW MACASSAR is a restructuring and softening hair care product enriched with plant-based keratin, which enhances shine, facilitates detangling, and leaves hair irresistibly soft. It is perfect for curly and damaged hair, providing long-lasting smoothness, unique shine, and a feeling of lightness. The formula contains rice extracts that protect hair from dryness, while jojoba oil strengthens and adds shine. This product also offers heat and sun protection, reduces split ends, and gives hair a healthy and vibrant appearance.

Suitable for all hair types, especially those seeking long-lasting smoothness, shine, and lightness.
products.ingredients: Cyclomethicone, Dimethicone, Oryza sativa (Rice) brand oil, Simmondsia chinensis (Jojoba) seed oil, Cananga odorata flower oil, Cocos nucifera (Coconut) oil, Linalool, Benzyl benzoate, Benzyl salicylate, Geraniol, Farnesol, Eugenol, Isoeugenol, Benzyl alcohol.

Nedidelį kiekį produkto tepkitė ant drėgnų ar sausų plaukų, paskirstykite per visą ilgį, ypatingą dėmesį skiriant galiukams. Nenuskalaukite.

Savybės ir privalumai:

WOW MACASSAR – tai restruktūrizuojantis ir minkštinantis plaukų priežiūros produktas su augaliniu keratinu, kuris suteikia žvilgesio, lengvina iššukavimą ir daro plaukus švelnius. Puikiai tinka garbanotiems ir pažeistiems plaukams, nes suteikia ilgalaikį švelnumą, unikalų blizgesį ir lengvumo pojūtį. Formulėje esantys ryžių ekstraktai apsaugo plaukus nuo išsausėjimo, jojobos aliejus stiprina ir suteikia žvilgesio. Produktas taip pat apsaugo nuo karščio ir saulės spindulių poveikio, mažina plaukų skilinėjimą ir suteikia plaukams sveiką bei gyvybingą išvaizdą.

Tinka visų tipų plaukams, siekiant suteikti ilgalaikį glotnumą, žvilgesį ir lengvumo pojūtį.

Wet the hair and evenly distribute a small amount of shampoo onto the scalp. Gently massage in circular motions and spread it evenly along the entire length of the hair. Rinse thoroughly with water. If necessary, repeat the process using a smaller amount of shampoo.

Features and Benefits:

The formula is enriched with plant extracts and 100% natural essential oils, which leave the hair looking healthy and shiny. The shampoo cleanses the scalp effectively without compromising its hydrolipidic balance.

Suitable for all hair types.

products.name: Naturalmente Nature Inside Moisturizing Styling Glaze Gel
products.short_description: A moisturizing and styling gel.
products.description:
Application:

Apply to damp hair, distribute evenly from roots to ends, and style as desired.

Features and Benefits:

Rich in 100% pure essential oils and plant extracts, including soy. The gel, combined with fixing agents, creates a protective film that helps smooth split ends and shields hair from heat damage caused by dryers or styling tools. Grapefruit moisturizes and adds firmness to the hair, eucalyptus effectively combats dandruff, and hydrolyzed soy proteins nourish and protect the hair. These ingredients leave the hair hydrated, stronger, and more flexible.

Suitable for all hair types.

Sudėtyje gausu 100% švarių eterinių aliejų ir augalinių ekstraktų, įskaitant sojų. products.name: Naturalmente Nature Inside Camomile Aloe Spray Tonic
products.short_description: Leave-in conditioning and restructuring tonic.
products.description:
Application:

Use after shampoo and conditioner. Remove excess water and spray from a distance of 10–15 cm. Due to the product's concentration, 2–3 sprays are sufficient. Do not rinse.

Features and Benefits:

The conditioning and restructuring tonic adds shine to the hair without weighing it down. Enriched with 100% pure essential oils and plant extracts, it helps maintain a healthy and radiant appearance. Aloe vera and chamomile soothe, moisturize, and relax the hair, while castor oil softens and adds volume.

The tonic effectively protects against heat damage, split ends, and static electricity. It can also be used as a leave-in conditioner.

Suitable for all hair types, especially frizz-prone hair.

Naudojimas:

Naudokite po šampūno ir kondicionieriaus. Pašalinkite vandens perteklių ir purkškite iš 10–15 cm atstumo. Dėl produkto koncentracijos, užtenka 2–3 papurškimų. Nenuskalaukite.

Savybės ir privalumai:

Kondicionuojantis ir atkuriantis tonikas suteikia plaukams žvilgesio jų neapsunkindamas. Sudėtyje gausu 100% švarių eterinių aliejų ir augalinių ekstraktų, kurie padeda išlaikyti plaukų sveiką išvaizdą ir spindesį. Alavijas ir ramunėlė ramina, drėkina bei atpalaiduoja plaukus, o ricinų aliejus minkština plaukus ir suteikia jiems apimties.

Tonikas efektyviai apsaugo nuo karščio poveikio, plaukų galiukų išsišakojimo ir elektrostatinio krūvio. Jis taip pat gali būti naudojamas kaip nenuskalaujamas kondicionierius.

After washing your hair with "Nature Inside" shampoo, rinse and towel dry. Apply an appropriate amount of the product and leave it on for a few minutes. Rinse thoroughly and dry.
